TopicTitle: F-15K - Strike Eagle/SLAM Eagle [When Eagles fly... MIGs die!!...]

Articles.Content:
I have to embarrass all of us Americans. Enjoy this wonderful song.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-07T10:33:55Z" title="05/07/2015 10:33  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 7, 2015</time> by andrew123**
I'm going to add an interceptor variant. More fun.
You're adding BD Weaponry I'm Assuming? Because that's great, it looks great I just need an accurate armament to shoot down some MiGs.

Hello 

It's a silly question but I have to ask. About this BD weaponry, all those planes with missiles and stuff, is just for aesthetics or you really shooting stuff down?
I've been trying to make an F-15 replica for a while now, and this did it! It would be cool to see some more F-14 replicas around here. Hmmm... I might just...

Great job mate !

The sky is safe now !

Echo 2 back to HQ , over...

> 
> I've been trying to make an F-15 replica for a while now, and this did it! It would be cool to see some more F-14 replicas around here. Hmmm... I might just...
